text: Need Isabella Garcia for Hungry Jack's campaign. Budget around $4,424, looking for 2 x Lifestyle photography, 3 x 90-second product demo, 3 x 3-minute vlog, 3 x YouTube video. 4 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 9 months. Engagement period: 5 months. Need to confirm: usage rights
